[CDF-24554]ðŸ˜…Support for dumping events (#1593)

# Description

Adds support for dumping events to csv/parquet.


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/325a29aa-3512-4245-925e-5e3a8d3f7f80)



## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] Support for dumping events, `cdf dump data events`. To enable
this set the flag `dump_data = true`.

## templates

No changes.
